titleStmt.title: Don Carlos Prince of Spain a tragedy, acted at the Duke's Theatre / written by Tho. Otway.
titleStmt.author: Otway, Thomas, 1652-1685.
Saint-Réal, M. l'abbé de (César Vichard), 1639-1692. Dom Carlos.

notesStmt.note: Based on Saint-Réal's novel of the same name.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
